QueryResult.text: SELECT FMPTF.PROJECT_ID PROJECT_ID, FMPTF.FISCAL_TIME_KEY FISCAL_TIME_KEY, PCF.OBS1_UNIT_ID OBS1_UNIT_ID, PCF.OBS2_UNIT_ID OBS2_UNIT_ID, PCF.OBS3_UNIT_ID OBS3_UNIT_ID, PCF.OBS4_UNIT_ID OBS4_UNIT_ID, PCF.OBS5_UNIT_ID OBS5_UNIT_ID, FMPTF.ENTITY ENTITY, FMPTF.ENTITY_NAME ENTITY_NAME, FMPTF.LOCATION LOCATION, FMPTF.LOCATION_NAME LOCATION_NAME, FMPTF.DEPARTMENT DEPARTMENT, FMPTF.DEPARTMENT_NAME DEPARTMENT_NAME, FMPTF.BUDGET_HOURS BUDGET_HOURS, FMPTF.ACTUAL_HOURS ACTUAL_HOURS, FMPTF.REV_BUDGET_LABOR REV_BUDGET_LABOR, FMPTF.REV_BUDGET_EQUIP REV_BUDGET_EQUIP, FMPTF.REV_BUDGET_EXPENSE REV_BUDGET_EXPENSE, FMPTF.REV_BUDGET_MATL REV_BUDGET_MATL, FMPTF.REV_BUDGET_TOTAL REV_BUDGET_TOTAL, FMPTF.COST_BUDGET_LABOR COST_BUDGET_LABOR, FMPTF.COST_BUDGET_EQUIP COST_BUDGET_EQUIP, FMPTF.COST_BUDGET_EXPENSE COST_BUDGET_EXPENSE, FMPTF.COST_BUDGET_MATL COST_BUDGET_MATL, FMPTF.COST_BUDGET_TOTAL COST_BUDGET_TOTAL, FMPTF.ACT_BILLING ACT_BILLING, FMPTF.REV_ACT_LABOR REV_ACT_LABOR, FMPTF.REV_ACT_EQUIP REV_ACT_EQUIP, FMPTF.REV_ACT_EXPENSE REV_ACT_EXPENSE, FMPTF.REV_ACT_MATL REV_ACT_MATL, FMPTF.REV_ACT_TOTAL REV_ACT_TOTAL, FMPTF.COST_ACT_LABOR COST_ACT_LABOR, FMPTF.COST_ACT_EQUIP COST_ACT_EQUIP, FMPTF.COST_ACT_EXPENSE COST_ACT_EXPENSE, FMPTF.COST_ACT_MATL COST_ACT_MATL, FMPTF.COST_ACT_TOTAL COST_ACT_TOTAL, FMPTF.COST_TO_COMPLETE COST_TO_COMPLETE, FMPTF.BUDGET_MARGIN BUDGET_MARGIN, FMPTF.BUDGET_REV_NUMBER BUDGET_REV_NUMBER, FMPTF.ROI_DATE ROI_DATE, FMPTF.CURRENCY_CODE CURRENCY_CODE, FMPTF.PCT_BUDGET_EXPENDED PCT_BUDGET_EXPENDED, FMPTF.IS_OPP_ENABLED IS_OPP_ENABLED, FMPTF.IS_FM_ENABLED IS_FM_ENABLED, FMPTF.IS_MGMT_ENABLED IS_MGMT_ENABLED FROM NBI_FM_PT_FACTS FMPTF, NBI_PROJECT_CURRENT_FACTS PCF WHERE FMPTF.PROJECT_ID = PCF.PROJECT_ID
